alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:03PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery County through 445 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Sunnyside, or 23 miles southeast of Price, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall will result in ponding of water along US 6. Locations impacted include... Woodside. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 265 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
